title: ICornerReliefFeatureData.Initialize
description: Initializes this corner relief feature to have specified corner relief bend type.

parameters.description: Corner relief bend type as defined by swCornerReliefBendType_e

returns: True if the corner relief feature is initialized to the specified bend type, false if not
